header.title: Hi, I am Tamas.
header.introtext: I am a self-taught web developer who is looking for his first full-time front-end position.

description.paragraph: My undergrad programme partially revolved around HTML, CSS and JS back in the late 2000s, and while I continued my grad programme with a social/political science angle and later worked as a teacher in several different institutions, my interest in coding in general never wavered.
In 2019, I refreshed my HTML, CSS and JS knowledge and continued with learning React and its ecosystem. I completed Udacity's FrontEnd NanoDegree programme in early 2020.
I have spent this last year building projects small and big to expand my knowledge in various directions.
Some of the techs I have been working with:

list.title: Star Wars Keys
list.subtitle: project-001
list.description: One of the many smaller vanilla HTML/CSS/JS projects I have created as practice.
